name: Farmhand
description:
Farmhand is an open source resource management game that puts a farm in your hand! It's designed to be both desktop and mobile-friendly and fun for 30 seconds or 30 minutes at a time. Can you build a thriving farming business? Give it a try and find out!

Farmhand's core game mechanic is fluctuating prices for seeds and crops. Try to buy seeds for a low price and sell their harvested crops for a high price! Prices fluctuate randomly from day to day in single-player mode. When playing online multiplayer, crop prices are affected by connected players' actions and are shared among everyone playing in a given online room.

Farmhand is a game you can play at your own pace and on your own terms. You can have a relaxed session all by yourself, or you can play competitively with your friends and other farmers across the world. The online multiplayer features are free!

You are welcome to join the growing Farmhand community! Here's where you can find it:

  • Farmhand Discord Server
  • @farmhandgame on Twitter
  • r/FarmhandGame on Reddit

If you want to back Farmhand's continued development, you can become a supporter on Patreon!
